title: Ticket #3350: Blahp depends on perl module XML::Simple
description:
The blahp perl script sge_helper uses the perl module XML::Simple in determining the status of an SGE job. This perl module isn't included in the base install of some linux distros.

We need to add a fallback option in case this module isn't installed on the machine. We'll modify sge_status.sh to parse the non-XML output of SGE's qstat if sge_helper fails.

This issue is also tracked as OSG Jira ticket CAMPUS-56: https://jira.opensciencegrid.org/browse/CAMPUS-56
